SELECT u.id, u.nickname AS userName, u.email, u.create_time AS createTime, u.status, ( IF ( u.`status`, '有效', '禁止登陆' ) ) AS state, u.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, r.description AS role FROM sys_user AS u INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.uid INNER JOIN sys_role r ON ur.rid = r.id WHERE r.type = #{dto.type}
AND u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%')

SELECT usr.id, usr.nickname AS username, usr.`status` AS state, usr.pswd AS password , usr.head_portraits AS userImg, usr.email, ur.rid AS roleid, r.`name` AS roleName, r.type AS type FROM sys_user AS usr LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON usr.id = ur.uid INNER JOIN sys_role AS r ON ur.rid = r.id WHERE usr.pswd = #{pass} AND usr.nickname = #{name}
